3: You arrive in the frigid Port District...
This place reminds you of Murmansk somehow...
I dislike the cold, but Miss Celica requested my deployment.
The intel says that the freight logistic system here is highly automated. Command assigned you Sophia just in case.
And, just for your information, this is near Murmansk—you're in Kyaranta. Though, only the port is still intact.
We're that close to ARU, huh.
Babylonia decided to reactivate the purification filter here to accommodate some ARU refugees. When you're done here, you could even hitch a ride to Murmansk.
The facilities here look good as new. Doesn't look like the Corrupted have gotten their hands on it.
When the Corrupted invaded this place, a high-frequency echo drew them all away.
No clues as to the source of the echo, but the facilities survived because of that.
Not all of them were drawn away, it seems.
